bibl.title: When Not Just Any Wine Will Do...? The Proliferation of Coan-type Wine and Amphoras in the Greco-Roman World.
bibl.note: Paper presented at a workshop on imitations in antiquity held in Winnipeg, Canada, in November 2007. - 1. Real and faux Coan wine at Rome. - 2. The spread of pseudo-Coan amphora production in the Roman period. - 3. The controversy: the correlation between shape and contents. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Münstersche [puis: Marburger] Beiträge zur antiken Handelsgeschichte

bibl.seg: Jennifer Moore, When Not Just Any Wine Will Do...? The Proliferation of Coan-type Wine and Amphoras in the Greco-Roman World.

Paper presented at a workshop on imitations in antiquity held in Winnipeg, Canada, in November 2007. - 1. Real and faux Coan wine at Rome. - 2. The spread of pseudo-Coan amphora production in the Roman period. - 3. The controversy: the correlation between shape and contents. - Conclusion.
